name: Mathematicsgamesforkids
0:
”Alexa, mathematics games”
”Alexa, ask mathematics games times table 2”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mathematics games
des:
Your kids will be able to check their knowledge about a particular times table (1 to 12).
Right now this skill only covers times tables.
If you want to play:
1) You have to open the skill by saying "mathematics games"
2) And then say "times table" and the one you want to play with. For example, you can say, "times table 2". 

After doing this, you have to answer all the questions Alexa, will ask you. If you answer all the questions correctly, Alexa, will tell you that you are a master of the selected times table.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
